# ui-button

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                       | Type                              | Default    |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------- | --------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Whether button should be disabled | `boolean`                         | `false`    |
| `type`     | `type`     | Type of the button                | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"` | `'button'` |
